scripts.clean: concurrently "rm -rf node_modules" "cd shared && rm -rf node_modules" "cd server && rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.bootstrap: concurrently "cd shared && npm install" "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.downgrade: concurrently "cd client && npm i react@15 react-dom@15" "cd shared && npm i react@15 react-dom@15" "cd server && npm i react@15 react-dom@15"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start" "cd shared && npm start"
scripts.upgrade: concurrently "cd client && npm i react@16 react-dom@16" "cd shared && npm i react@16 react-dom@16" "cd server && npm i react@16 react-dom@16"
